data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sikora, Bozena, Kaszewska, Katarzyna, Skoracki, Maciej (2014): Two new quill mites of the family Syringophilidae (Acari: Prostigmata) parasitising the tapaculos (Passeriformes: Rhinocryptidae) in South America. Zootaxa 3895 (3): 419-426, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3895.3.6
